[Tibet](/wiki/Tibetan_Buddhism) - [Vietnam](/wiki/Buddhism_in_Vietnam) - Buddhism portal - v - t - e **Vipassana Meditation Centre** is a [Buddhist](/wiki/Buddhist) centre in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) set up in 1993 to propagate and perpetuating [Theravada Buddhism](/wiki/Theravada_Buddhism) and provide opportunity for the practice of [Vipassana meditation](/wiki/Vipassana_meditation) in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). This group is not related to non-sectarian society "Vipassana International Center (Singapore)", which offers 10 Day residential meditation courses, taught by [SN Goenka](/wiki/SN_Goenka), in the tradition of [Sayagyi U Ba Khin](/wiki/Sayagyi_U_Ba_Khin). ## Overview Vipassana Meditation Centre was founded in 1993 as a non-profit organization with the objective of providing opportunities and a venue for all [Buddhists](/wiki/Buddhists) and non-Buddhists alike in cultivating their [dhamma](/wiki/Dhamma) practice. Notable advisors and teachers affiliated with the meditation centre include [Ovadacariya Sayadaw U Panditabhivamsa](/wiki/Sayadaw_U_Pandita). There are several meditation locations across the world (Examples: Singapore, Australia, China, South Korea) - [Burmese Buddhist Temple](/wiki/Burmese_Buddhist_Temple) - [Palelai Buddhist Temple](/wiki/Palelai_Buddhist_Temple) - [Wat Ananda Metyarama Thai Buddhist Temple](/wiki/Wat_Ananda_Metyarama_Thai_Buddhist_Temple) - [Sri Lankaramaya Buddhist Temple](/wiki/Sri_Lankaramaya_Buddhist_Temple) - [Ti-Sarana Buddhist Association](/wiki/Ti-Sarana_Buddhist_Association) - Bodhiraja Buddhist Society - [Vipassana meditation](/wiki/Vipassana_meditation) - [Vipassana movement](/wiki/Vipassana_movement) - [Mindfulness (psychology)](/wiki/Mindfulness_(psychology)) - [Acceptance and commitment therapy](/wiki/Acceptance_and_commitment_therapy) - [Mindfulness-based stress reduction](/wiki/Mindfulness-based_stress_reduction) - [Neural mechanisms of mindfulness meditation](/wiki/Neural_mechanisms_of_mindfulness_meditation) - Official website - Vipassana Meditation Centre on [Facebook](/wiki/Facebook_(identifier)) 39°48′00″N 75°28′08″W﻿ / ﻿39.80006°N 75.46900°W﻿ / 39.80006; -75.46900 This article about a [Buddhist convent](/wiki/Vihara) is a stub.
